subtitleText.scanTip: Hold your card within the frame untill all 4 edges turn blue.

instructionText.captureStateText: Place your ID within the frame and take a picture
instructionText.confirmStateText: Make sure the picture has no glare and not blurry

alertText.retryLimitErrorText: You have reached the maximum number of attempts. Please try again later
alertText.networkErrorText: Please check your internet connection and try again
alertText.retryErrorNoDocumentText: Please make sure you are using the required type of document
alertText.retryErrorWrongDocumentText: Please make sure you are using the required type of document
alertText.retryErrorImperfectText: Please make sure the ID is fully visible and not blocked
alertText.retryErrorBlurText: Please make sure the document is fully visible, glare free and not blurred
alertText.retryErrorExposureText: Please make sure the document is fully visible, glare free and not blurred
alertText.retryErrorNoFaceText: Please make sure the document is fully visible, glare free and not blurred
alertText.retryErrorExpireText: Please make sure the document is not expired
alertText.retryErrorNoSigText: Please make sure there is signature on the document
alertText.retryErrorDefaultText: Please make sure the document is fully visible, glare free and not blurred
alertText.cameraAccessErrorTextNotAllowed: Please allow access to the camera and try again
alertText.unsupportedDeviceTitle: Browser or device is not supported
alertText.unsupportedDeviceText: The browser or device is not supported, please change the browser or device.

errorPageText.errorPageText: Copy the following URL and open it in Safari (iOS) or Chrome (android) to continue the process.
errorPageText.errorPageCopiedText: Paste the URL in Safari (iOS) or Chrome (android) to continue the process.
